TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlSecurityTokenHandler extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler

summary.span: Represents a security token handler that creates security tokens from SAML 1.1 Assertions.

span.span: Represents a security token handler that creates security tokens from SAML 1.1 Assertions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別序列化和還原序列化安全性權杖的 SAML 1.1 判斷提示到物件。The class serializes and deserializes security tokens backed by SAML 1.1 Assertions into objects. 安全性權杖處理常式負責建立、 讀取、 寫入和驗證權杖。Security token handlers are responsible for creating, reading, writing, and validating tokens. 您可以設定安全性權杖服務 (STS) 或信賴憑證者 (RP) 應用程式處理 SAML 1.1 判斷提示為基礎的安全性權杖所加入的執行個體類別設定服務 （或應用程式） 的物件。You can configure a security token service (STS) or relying party (RP) application to process SAML 1.1 Assertion-backed security tokens by adding an instance of the class to the object configured for the service (or application). 這可以透過程式設計方式或在組態檔中完成。This can be done either programmatically or in the configuration file. 透過集合的集合針對指定的設定會設定處理常式本身屬性加入至集合時。The handler itself is configured from the configuration specified for the collection through the collection’s property when it is added to the collection. 雖然您可以藉由設定個別設定的處理常式其屬性，這不是通常需要; 不過，如果處理常式必須在個別的設定，屬性應設定之後，處理常式加入至集合。While it is possible to configure the handler individually by setting its property, this is not normally necessary; however, if the handler must be configured individually, the property should be set after the handler is added to the collection. 以許多情形來說類別可用來當做-; 不過，這個類別會提供許多擴充點透過方法它公開。For many scenarios, the class can be used as-is; however, the class provides many extension points through the methods it exposes. 由衍生自和覆寫特定方法時，您可以修改的預設實作中，在提供的權杖處理功能，或加入可能需要在 Saml 規格的延伸模組的處理某些自訂的情況。By deriving from the and overriding specific methods, you can modify the functionality of the token processing provided in the default implementation, or you can add processing for extensions to the SAML Assertion specification that may be needed in some custom scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，條件應該包含在限制的誤用，判斷提示之影響的判斷提示。Generally, conditions should be included in assertions to limit the impact of misuse of the assertion. 指定的 NotBefore 和 NotOnOrAfter 條件可以限制的弱點可能會在受到危害的判斷提示的情況下的期間。Specifying the NotBefore and NotOnOrAfter conditions can limit the period of vulnerability in the case of a compromised assertion. AudienceRestrictionCondition 可用來明確指定預定的信賴憑證者合作對象，或判斷提示，搭配適當的對象限制強制在信賴憑證者的合作對象之合作對象可以幫助減輕信賴憑證者之間的詐騙攻擊合作對象。The AudienceRestrictionCondition can be used to explicitly state the intended relying party or parties of the assertion, which coupled with appropriate audience restriction enforcement at relying parties can help to mitigate spoofing attacks between relying parties. 預設實作會建立為基礎的 NotBefore 和 NotOnOrAfter 條件屬性`tokenDescriptor`。The default implementation creates NotBefore and NotOnOrAfter conditions based on the property of the `tokenDescriptor`. 它也會產生限制的判斷提示來取用 AudienceRestrictionCondition屬性`tokenDescriptor`。It will also generate an AudienceRestrictionCondition limiting consumption of the assertion to the property of the `tokenDescriptor`.
